documentSummary: The document provides an overview of Frido's omnichannel presence, international expansion, awards, media coverage, and leadership team.

chunks.content:
frido

Omnichannel Presence

D2C Shopify
We entertain 1,00,000+ sessions per day on an average
Our AOV intent is Rs 1800+

Offline Sales
Present in 1500+ Stores
Piloting in home furnishing & car accessories categories in offline channel
GT, MT, Corporate, B2B, Export, Expo & Exhibitions, Institutional Sales.

Marketplace
Amazon heavy
Present in Flipkart & other E-Commerce
Presence in Blinkit, Zepto

International Expansion
Presence in UK, UAE, US.
chunks.title: Omnichannel Presence and International Expansion
chunks.summary: This section details Frido's omnichannel presence, including D2C Shopify sessions, offline sales in 1500+ stores, and marketplace presence. It also highlights international expansion in the UK, UAE, and US.

chunks.content:
Awards & Recognition

Frido is a proud category leader on Amazon, ranked as the No. 1 bestseller with over 1.2 million orders fulfilled.
As one of India’s fastest-growing D2C brands, our journey has been spotlighted by top publications like NDTV, Inc42, & Hindustan Times. Our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction fuels our ongoing success and recognition.

Winner Amazon Sambhav Award
